Header: Road tragedy : Four family members perished
Content: Four persons from the same family died following an accident involving a three-wheeler and a lorry at Yatigalpotta, Galewela. Police said that the head-on collision took place this morning (Apr. 02). The victims, father, mother, son and daughter of the same family. They were residents of Attanagalle. Father was aged 46 and the mother was 42-years-old. The son was aged 20 and his sister was aged 8.
